title: Dongguan Stylish Stay with Upscale Dining
description: InterContinental Dongguan, an IHG Hotel, offers high-end comfort and a convenient location at the heart of the Dongguan International Trade Centre. Work up a sweat in the fintess centre or swimming pool or savour satisfying Vietnamese and Thai cuisine at Spices restaurant. As the sun sets, kick back with a cool cocktail at the Lobby Lounge or explore Dongguan for an authentic taste of Cantonese culture before retiring to your room to gaze out over the captivating city and mountain views.
offer_address: T4 Guo Mao Center, No. 1 East Hong Fu Road, Dongguan, Guangdong Province, 523000, China
